meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: White House Shifts Its Focus on Climate In a striking shift, the administration issued a report indicating that emissions of carbon dioxide and other heat-trapping gases were the only likely explanation for global warming.

An administration official said that the report to Congress reflected ''the best possible scientific information'' on climate change. Previously, President Bush and others had stressed uncertainties in understanding the causes and consequences of warming as a reason for rejecting restrictions.

White House Shifts Its Focus on Climate In a striking shift, the administration issued a report indicating that emissions of carbon dioxide and other heat-trapping gases were the only likely explanation for global warming.

An administration official said that the report to Congress reflected ''the best possible scientific information'' on climate change. Previously, President Bush and others had stressed uncertainties in understanding the causes and consequences of warming as a reason for rejecting restrictions.

Russia Investigates Crashes Russian investigators searched for the causes of the almost simultaneous crashes of two passenger jets shortly after they took off from Moscow on Tuesday night, killing 89 people.

Ban on Central Park Rally A judge ruled that organizers of the largest protest planned during the Republican convention week may not hold a rally in Central Park, throwing into doubt what thousands will do after marching.

Elisabeth KÃ¼bler-Ross Dies The psychiatrist, whose work with terminally ill patients helped to revolutionize attitudes toward the care of the dying and inspired the creation of hospices, died at her home in Scottsdale, Ariz. She was 78.

Israelis Rejoice Over First Olympic Gold Medal Gal Fridman won Israel's first-ever Olympic gold medal, capturing the windsurfing event and bringing joy, pride and relief to his country. After Israelis celebrated with him at the ceremony, Fridman said he would take his medal to the Tel Aviv memorial for the 11 Israeli athletes and coaches killed in a Palestinian terrorist attack at the 1972 Munich Games.
Discord on G.O.P. Platform Conservatives mounted an unexpected challenge to President Bush's positions on stem cell research and immigration.
